mapper.insert: insert into erp_purchase (purchase_id, purchase_employee, purchase_location, purchase_date) values(#{purchase_id}, #{purchase_employee}, #{purchase_location}, #{purchase_date} )
mapper.update: update erp_purchase set purchase_date=#{purchase_date}, purchase_employee=#{purchase_employee}, purchase_location=#{purchase_location} where purchase_id = #{purchase_id}
